name: The Spindly Man Collection
description:
=== The Legendary Triology ===

Back in 2017, a storm hit Gamejolt. That storm left people broken, terrified out of their minds, and questioning not only their existence, but the very fabric of reality itself. That storm came in the form of a masterpiece of horror game design. That storm was the Spindly Man triology.

=== What is Spindly Man? ===

Spindly Man is a horror game with a heavy focus on story telling and building a compelling universe full of colourful characters, and concepts unlike any other. Spindly Man was an episodic series in which every new release progressed the depth of the lore & the complexity of the design, making every release make the last seem small in comparison.

=== Reviews ===

"This game is a massive overhaul from the first game adding a lot more complexity and plot. This game is no longer the running dick joke..."
-TheTeeJayW

"5/5 It left me speechless and craving for more"
-DGaming

"That part with Bliss Bot was real funny and that ending with spindly man had the best music"
-NachoDogGaming

" 5/5 for your funny, creepy, scary awesome game :)"
-RostigerRentner

"I have to say, Spindly Man is my favorite anime as of now"
-DGaming

"The way how I feel about Bulge-Boy's games is that they're really inspiring... He doesn't care about all the graphics or put a whole lot of money into his projects he just does it because he enjoys it and that's the amazing thing about this creator."
-HeZoKo

"Once in a lifetime game. Must play, 10/10, 1337 HAX0R. Would recommend to buy for a friend's brother's best man at his wedding."
-Spoonage

"It's just one of those retarded kind of games that you can't help but love"
-TheSoreLoserGamers

"It's a good effort I guess, son" - My dad :)

(Disclaimer: Unlike a lot of things stated here, these reviews aren't actually a joke. These are real quotes from real people).

=== Sounds Absoluetly Mint ===

Right you are!

=== Okay, now, tell the truth. What is Spindly Man? ===

Alright you got me. The Spindly Man triology was a set of joke horror games released in 2017 - early 2018 that were created with extremely low effort in hopes to troll some people just looking for a good, spooky horror game to play. But, after uploading the first one, I never actually really intended to make another one (even though the ending of Spindly Man 1 stated "To Be Continued". I just didn't care enough). But, shortly after uploading the game there began to be YouTube let's plays that popped up of people playing Spindly Man. This blew me away. I was completely dazed by how many people put in the effort to play and record a terrible joke game created with the intention to troll. This gave me a sudden rush of motivation to create a bigger, better second one. Then, when the second one attracted even more people then the first, and also got onto the front page of Gamejolt, I then made a third.

So that's it. These games are ancient relics from the past and represent a good starting point for me as a creator of joke games. I hope you enjoy.
